title: All Commands
description: A list of all the available commands.

access-list.title: Access List
access-list.description: Used to manage User and Role Blacklists/Whitelists.

<COMMAND-NAME>.title: <COMMAND-NAME>
<COMMAND-NAME>.description:
Used to manage the Access List for the specified command.
Works with: `channel`, `role`, `sound`, `suggestion`, `suggestion-manager`.

type.title: Type
type.description: Shows the current type of the Access List.

set.title: Set
set.description:
Sets the type of the Access List.
Valid types: `blacklist`, `whitelist`.

user.title: User
user.description: Used to manage the User Access List.

list.title: List
list.description: Lists all Users in the Access List.

add.title: Add
add.description: Adds all the specified Users to the Access List.

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Removes all the specified Users from the Access List.

role.title: Role
role.description: Used to manage the Role Access List.

list.title: List
list.description: Lists all Roles in the Access List.

add.title: Add
add.description: Adds all the specified Roles to the Access List.

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Removes all the specified Roles from the Access List.

banana.title: Banana
banana.description: Gets a random Banana GIF from Tenor.

boost.title: Boost
boost.description: Used to manage Boost Announcements for this Guild from the Bot.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Shows the currently set Channel for Nitro Boost Announcements.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the Channel for Nitro Boost Announcements to the one specified.

test.title: Test
test.description: Tests Nitro Boost Announcements by sending the Announcement either to the specified Channel or the default one.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Manages Private Voice and Text Channels.

create.title: Create
create.description: Creates a new Private Text Channel.

create.title: Create
create.description: Creates a new Private Voice Channel.

category.title: Category
category.description: Shows the Category for new Private Channels.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the Category for new Private Channels.

voice-creation-channel.title: Voice Creation Channel
voice-creation-channel.description: Shows the Channel that an User should join to automatically create a new Voice Channel.

template-role.title: Template Role
template-role.description: Manages Template Roles for new Channels' Permissions.

everyone.title: Everyone
everyone.description: Shows the Template Role for Everyone.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the Template Role for Everyone.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Shows the Template Role for the Channel Owner.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the Template Role for the Channel Owner.

counter.title: Counter
counter.description: Shows the current count of this Channel.

start.title: Start
start.description: Starts a new Counter in this Channel.

terminate.title: Terminate
terminate.description: Removes the Counter in this Channel or the one specified.

config.title: Config
config.description: Used to configure Counter Channel settings.

allow-messages.title: Allow Messages
allow-messages.description: If false Messages that aren't numbers will be deleted.

allow-errors.title: Allow Errors
allow-errors.description: If false Messages that are the wrong number will be ignored and deleted.

alternate-member.title: Alternate Member
alternate-member.description: If true Messages that would change the count that are sent from the same person who changed it last time will be ignored and deleted.

best.title: Best
best.description: Replies with the best count this Channel has reached.

list.title: List
list.description: Shows all active Counters in this Guild.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets this Guild's language to the one specified.

message.title: Message
message.description: Sends a message and calculates the time needed for that message to be sent.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets this Guild's prefix to the one specified.

managers.title: Managers
managers.description: Manages role managers of this guild.

add.title: Add
add.description: Adds all the specified roles to the specified manager (role).

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Removes all the specified roles from the specified manager (role).

all.title: All
all.description: Removes all roles from the specified manager (role).

list.title: List
list.description: Lists all role manageable by the specified manager (role).

all.title: All
all.description: Lists all manager roles and their manageable roles.

clear.title: Clear
clear.description: Removes all managers from this guild.

add.title: Add
add.description: Adds all specified roles to the specified user.

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Removes all specified roles from the specified user.

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Shows if shortcuts are enabled in this Guild.

set.title: Set
set.description: Enables or disables shortcuts for this Guild.

sound.title: Sound
sound.description:
Plays the specified sound.
Use `sound play` if a sound has the same name as a subcommand.

stop.title: Stop
stop.description: Stops playing the currently playing Sound if any.

leave.title: Leave
leave.description: Leaves the current channel if connected.

play.title: Play
play.description:
Plays the specified sound.
This is an alias for `sound`, use this is a sound has the same name as a subcommand.

suggestion.title: Suggestion
suggestion.description: Sends a new suggestion for the guild.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Shows the current channel for suggestions.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the current channel for suggestions.

result.title: Result
result.description: Shows the current channel for suggestion results.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the current channel for suggestion results.

approve.title: Approve
approve.description: Approves the specified suggestion with the specified reason.

reject.title: Reject
reject.description: Rejects the specified suggestion with the specified reason.
